transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan, Super Traders Khandwa se bol raha hu.
Customer: Ji sir, kaha se?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello, Super Traders ji sir, yes sir, boliye boliye.
Executive: Main bol raha tha ki abhi season chal raha hai solar pump controller ka.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To kuch clients aap confirm karaiye na. Purana lagaya hua vasul to ho to fir aapka plan aage badhaye nahi to fir main drop karunga is aage aapko.
Customer: Thik hai, ek second, ek second sir call pe hi rahiyega, thik hai? Main aage discuss kar rahi hu.
Customer: Abhi kuch, ek second sir.
Customer: Aap Jyoti madam bol rahe hai?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, haan Jyoti madam bol rahe hai?
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Customer: Poonam.
Executive: Poonam mam bol rahe hai. 793 aapne aapko detail dali hai pump ke rate wagera?
Customer: Kya sir?
Executive: Hello. 793 last me aapka jo number hai wo hai na whatsapp pe?
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: To maine aapko pump, controller, panel sabke alag alag rate dale hai.
Customer: Sir India mart se?
Executive: Haan haan India mart se kal aapka hi phone aaya tha.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Aur aapko maine detail bhi phone kiya tha aapka plan.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji sir haan ji to aapne detail wagera matlab whatsapp pe bheja hai product ki.
Executive: Haan. Haan to unhone kaha tha ki aap renew karaiye to maine kaha ki abhi to purane paise hi nahi vasul hue. India mart se koi customer nahi mila.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To unhone kaha ki ki hum aapki itni sale kara dete hai do char panch lakh ki to aap naya plan le lenge to maine kaha ki haan koi dikkat nahi hai ki char panch lakh ki sale kara dete hai aap to 40 hazar ka margin nikal jayega main aapko pay kar dunga aur aage badhane ke liye plan.
Executive: To unhone kaha tha ki aapke manager ko aap photo rate dal dena hum aapke liye alag se mehnat karke kuch client dhund ke denge.
Customer: Haan matlab sir wo leads wagera ki baat hoti hai ki jaise ki hum apni taraf se aapko leads wagera bhejenge filter out karke to aapne kaun kaun se product ka naam bheja hai sir?
Executive: Maine aapko diya hai na solar pump, solar DC pump, solar controller aur solar panel.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Panel bhi unme char panch companiyo ke acche rate pe leke baitha hu 12 13 per watt ke rate pe ab badh gaya 18 19 ka rate ho gaya panel ka company ka hi maine barish ke pehle ke kharide hue rakhe hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Thik hai sir inki leads hum aapko location ka to koi dikkat nahi hai na kahin se bhi India all India me se kahin se bhi bheje to?
Executive: Haan haan jaise dekhiye aisa rahega panel yadi minimum order 300 panel ka hai to pure desh me kahin pe bhi gadi provide karti hai usse kam ka hai to fir bhada alag lagega customer ko.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Thik hai solar pump se related hi jyada chahiye aapko aur 300 pieces aapne minimum bola hai.
Executive: Solar pump ka hi chal raha hai usi ke client confirm honge nahi to dusre product abhi nahi bikenge.
Customer: Thik hai sir sir hum dekhte hai aapki taraf se aapko in jo products ke naam bheje hai aapne main aapki taraf se search out karke aur jo bhi leads mujhe achi lagegi ki ye aapke kaam ki ho sakti hai main aapko alag se whatsapp pe bhi bhej diya karungi aap unko consume karke dekhiye aapko waha se kaisa response aa raha hai.
Executive: Sir leads to leads to main daily mere paas kam se kam 50 call aate hai India mart se solar pump ke se related.
Executive: India mart se bhi 10 12 bahar se bhi aate hai lekin client convert nahi ho raha hai kahan kuch saste me mil raha hai kya mil raha hai kahan se le raha hai.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Okay haan ji sir haan ji main aapko jo by leads hai aapko bola hai maine even maine kiya bhi tha sir unka bhi koi response nahi aaya aapko?
Executive: Aapne baat bhi kari thi ek do customer se to wo bas ek ek aad do din ke baad bolne lag jate hai ki hum to kewal enquiry kar rahe the abhi nahi kharidna hai.
Customer: Jo maine bheji thi unpe bhi yahi response hai sir.
Executive: Haan sahi hai sahi response tha.
Customer: Okay aur aapne I think mujhe kal raat me bheji bhi thi kuch by leads right sir?
Executive: Haan haan wo ek bulk order bhi tha usse bhi baat chal rahi hai usse aap baat karke dekhiye kahan se le raha hai pata to chale ki vyakti kharid raha hai.
Customer: Sir uss wale ka name bataiye sir name bataiye kis wale se main baat kar lu.
Executive: Sanawat ke paas teen piece chahiye teen HP ke jisko.
Customer: Ek second ek second sir. Location
Executive: Wo bata dijiye aap sabse sabse upar dekhiye.
Customer: Whatsapp pe sabse upar. Kaha pe sir?
Customer: Whatsapp pe sabse upar hi maine open kiya hai.
Executive: 167 uska number hai last me.
Customer: 16 7 Hello. Sir ye matlab ye kaha se aaye 167 okay main inse baat karke dekh lungi sir thik hai?
Executive: Thik hai inke alawa bhi aur kuch aap start karke ek do mahine me yadi mera ho gaya char panch lakh ka business aapki taraf se to main renew kara lunga aapke manager ka bhi kal phone aaya tha kisi ka.
Customer: Please and sir main aapko by leads bhi bhejungi kuch unse bhi aap response dekhiyega sir thik hai main aapko filter out karke bhejungi sir aur aap I think aapne call sir matlab mujhe hi kiya kariye aapke paas mera number to hoga sir.
Executive: Nahi wo kya hai ki wo mere ko usko agli bar me usi pe karunga jisko message jispe message bheja hai na aapne wo number main ab save kar leta hu.
Customer: Haan sir isi number pe mere pe kijiyega sir thik hai.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Jo mera whatsapp wala number hai sir usi pe hi call karna aap thik hai jab ya to aap whatsapp pe message kar dena ya to aap usi pe hi call karna sir.
Customer: Okay sir okay aapko rate pura pattern to samajh me aa gaya mere product sare dekh liye rate dekh liye aapne bas usse related customer ho.
Customer: Haan ji sir aapke product dekh liya hai ye e-commerce ye matlab solar se related hi mujhe bhejna hai aur aapne bola tha teen HP se upar ki chahiye right sir?
Executive: Haan. Teen HP panch HP saade panch HP minimum chahiye right sir minimum aapki three HP thi isse upar ki.
Executive: Nahi apan ek HP ek HP do HP bhi de denge.
Customer: Haan lekin wo kya hai ki thik hai thik hai koi nahi 30 40 hazar ka product rehta hai usme margin nahi hai aur customer utna hi pareshan karta hai jitna panch HP wala.
Customer: Thik hai sir main ek bar dekh leti hu.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Main aapko bhej dungi ek bari sir aur aapko jab bhi kuch bhi issue aaye to aap mujhe hi call karna sir thik hai.
Executive: Okay okay. Aap mera number save kar lena sir jispe message kiya hai na sir wahi wala aur main aapko usi number pe bhejungi na jispe aapne raat me mujhe share kiya tha ye.
Executive: Haan haan wo 570 wale pe hi bhejiyega ji ji.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai sir okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants confirmation of clients for solar pump.

- Old investment not recovered from IndiaMART.

- Leads provided not converting into sales.



Resolution:

- Executive shared product rates on WhatsApp.

- Executive will filter and send relevant leads.

- Customer to call executive directly for issues.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send leads on WhatsApp.

- Customer will contact executive with issues.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, solar pump, client conversion, whatsapp
